message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $18,000. I think it will really meet your needs and provide excellent value.
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for it. Can you meet me halfway?

Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $18,000 represents fair market value, I understand you're looking for a deal. How about we meet at $15,000? This product will bring you a lot of value over time.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, $15,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $13,500 for the product. Can you meet me at that price?
